snippet: The former Life photojournalist and textile designer lives in a 1914 co-op on the Upper East Side of Manhattan.
abstract: Luise Stauss Domains column interview with Inger McCabe Elliott, textile designer and onetime photojournalist for Life magazine, in which she discusses notable features of her Upper East Side apartment in New York City.
lead_paragraph: The former Life photojournalist and textile designer lives in a 1914 co-op on the Upper East Side of Manhattan.

headline.print_headline: A Collected Home for Inger McCabe Elliott
headline.main: A Collected Home for Inger McCabe Elliott
